Posts.Content: Thank you all for your comments and support and advice. I am keeping busy which as you say is not hard this time of year. I made a mistake it was 80% chance it’s malignant. I am finding it difficult that I was unaware of the lump. I have always examined myself and nothing till now. I will let you all know how my follow up goes. Good luck to any one else who is waiting results. Take care every one and thank you again.
Posts.Title: Waiting for my breast biopsy results

Posts.Content: This is my first posting on this site so hi to everyone. I had my routine mammogram three weeks ago and last Friday went to the breast clinic as I was recalled.. I had several more mammograms an ultra sound and a core biopsy. We then saw the breast care nurse who said the radiographer had scored me a 4 which apparently means it’s suspicious. On questioning she said I had a 98%chance it was cancer. Either way it would have to be removed and either way may have have radiotherapy. I get the results this Friday. I am trying to stay positive but I expect you can relate to this but it just sweeps over you. It’s so good to have a site like this to be able to support each other.
Posts.Title: Waiting for my breast biopsy results
